title: Ticket #1405: ConvertDefaultIPToSocketIP can break TCP_FORWARDING_HOST
description:
Peter Doherty at Harvard found when using glideinWMS that when using TCP_FORWARDING_HOST on the the collector/schedd machine that the startds are trying to connect back to the schedd's CCB connection request on the schedd's private address rather than the address specified by TCP_FORWARDING_HOST.

The problem is caused by ConvertDefaultIPToSocketIP().
